verses.1: Tua ciangin a mipa in a laizang a om inn dei ah hong paipih hi. Tua inn dei lutna lampi teh a,
verses.2: pi 18 zai a, a pang tuak a om kawmte pi giat tuak a sah hi. A laizang a om inn dei sung a teh ciangin pi 68 sau a, pi 34 zai hi.
verses.3: Tua ciangin inn dei sung nungah amah pai a, tua sung lutna lampi a teh ciangin pi thum sau-in pi sawm zai a, a pang tuak a om kawmte pi 12 tuak a sah hi.
verses.4: Tua inn dei sung nung a teh ciangin a dung a vai pi 34 tuak a pha hi. Tua ciangin amah in kei kiangah, “Hih lai pen Siangtho Pen Mun ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
verses.5: Tua ciangin amah in biakinn kawm pua nung teh a, pi sawm tak a sah hi. Hih kawm tawh a kimatin biakinn kimkot ah inn dei neuneu om a, tuate pi sagih vive a zai hi.
verses.6: Hih inn dei neute dawl thum pha a, dawl khat gual pai phei suak ah inn dei neu sawm thum om hi. Tua inn dei neute a dawl sanna tawh kizui-in a biakinn kawm pa to tektek a, tua inn dei neute a nang dingin khuam a tuamin kul loin a biakinn kawm kimang toto hi.
verses.7: Tua biakinn kawm pang bel a kibawl inn dei neute sungah kahlei om to a, a dawl nuainung panin a tungnung dongin kizom to hi. A inn dei neute a dawl sanna lamah a biakinn kawm a pat tektek mah bangin a sang lam a om inn dei neute a sung zai semsem hi.
verses.8: Biakinn kimkot teng a lei kitawi to a, a mundangte sangin pi sawmin sang to zaw hi. Tua mun panin biakinn kawm le a kimkot a inn dei neute kipan to pan hi.
verses.9: Inndei neute a kawm sahna pi giat pha a,
verses.10: biakinn kimkot ah suangphah bangin a kitawi to-in a kibawl a zaina pi 34 ahi hi.
verses.11: Biakinn kimkot ah a om inn dei neute ah pai nading kongvang, leilu lamah khat omin, leitaw lamah khat om hi. Tua biakinn kimkot ah pi giat paisuak a zai cial khat a om leuleu hi.
verses.12: Tua ciangin nitumna lamah biakinn lam a nga inn khat om hi. A inn dung pi 150 hi a, a vai pi 116 hi a, a kimkot a a kawm pi kua a sah hi.
verses.13: Tua ciangin mipa in biakinn teh a, pi 168 a pha hi. A kimkot a mun awng, a inn sung le a kawm tawh kigawmin pi 168 ahi hi.
verses.14: Nisuahna lam pang biakinn mailam a vailam zong a mun awng tawh kigawmin pi 168 mah ahi hi.
verses.15: Tua ciangin biakinn nitumna lam pangah a om, a tual lam a nga inn a sauna teh a, a kawm tegel tawh kigawmin pi 168 mah a pha hi. Biakinn sung lut nading inn dei le a inn deipi le Siangtho Pen Mun sungte pen
verses.16: a sual panin a kongvangneute ciang dong singpeek tawh kidap hi. A tawlette pen a pualam a kihui-in a kibawl ahi hi.
verses.17: Biakinn sung lam kawmte pen kongkhak zang ciang dong lim kibawlte tawh kidim a,
verses.18: nisuh kungte le kherub limte vive ahi hi. A masa-in nisuh kung, tua ciangin kherub, nisuh kung, kherub cih bangin a kimkot khempeuh ah kihelh to dimdiam hi. Tua kherub-te in maitang nih ciat nei uh hi.
verses.19: A mihing maitang pen a pang khat lam a om nisuh kung lam nga a, a humpinelkai maitang pen a pang lang khat lam a om nisuh kung lam a nga hi. A biakinn sung kimkot ah hih bangin kibawl a,
verses.20: sual panin kongkhak zang kikal sung khempeuh ah a dimin a om hi.
verses.21: Biakinn deipi kongkhak khuamte pen a siik kikim vive ahi hi.
verses.22: Tua ciangin Siangtho Pen Mun mai ah sing tawh a kibawl biakna tau bang pian khat a om hi. Pi nga sang a, a dung a vai pi li ahi hi. A khete, a kingaknate le a zawlte sing tawh a kibawl ahi hi. A mipa in kei kiangah, “Hih pen Topaʼ mai ah a kikoih sabuai ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
verses.23: Inn deipi sung lut nading le Siangtho Pen Mun lutna dingah kongkhak a om hi.
verses.24: Tua kongkhakte pen a laizang ah a kituah, kongkhak peek nih nei-in a kibawl ahi hi.
verses.25: Biakinn sung kawmte tungah a kibawl mah bangin hih biakinn deipi sung lutna-a kongkhakte tungah zong nisuh kung le kherub mah a kibawl hi. Kongkhak pualam, inn sung lutna ding inn dei sanah singpeek tawh liimsun khat a kibawl hi.
verses.26: Hih inn deipi sung kawmte tungah a pualam a kihui tawlette om a, nisuh kungte tawh zepna zong a kibawl hi.
